info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 1:09PM EST until January 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, mainly for areas along and north of Route 28. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lake effect snow band will drop southward across northern Herkimer County for late this afternoon and into tonight. It will weaken and return back northward on Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
